channel.title: Biomechanics on Łukasz Kidziński
channel.description: Recent content in Biomechanics on Łukasz Kidziński

item.title: Golf swing analysis app
item.description: During Stanford Ignite progrem, together with my teammates we were evaluating commercial opportunities of applying AI for sport’s coaching. We prototyped a mobile app using pose estimation algorithms for improving golf swing performance.

item.title: Learning how to run (NIPS)
item.description: I’ve build a musculoskeletal reinforcement learning environment for studying motor control using modern methods from computer science, neuroscience, biomechanics, etc. I’ve set up a competition to build models of the brain in the crowdAI. Competition was accepted as one of the 5 official competitions at NIPS 2017 and one of 8 competitions at NIPS 2018, attracting over 500 teams from all over the world. Here are some solutions from the first challenge
